tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE TeleoncologyMeetings (
	scheduled_date DATE,
	scheduled_time TIME,
	meeting_type VARCHAR(50),
	participants TEXT,
	agenda TEXT,
	location VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE cancer_meetings (
  meeting_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  meeting_date DATE,
  meeting_time TIME,
  team_id INT,
  meeting_agenda TEXT,
  CONSTRAINT fk_team_id FOREIGN KEY (team_id) REFERENCES teleoncology_teams(team_id)
);

CREATE TABLE multidisciplinary_meetings (
  meeting_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  meeting_date DATE,
  meeting_time TIME,
  is_virtual BOOLEAN,
  team_lead VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE consultations (
  consultation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  consult_date DATE,
  consult_time TIME,
  team_id INT REFERENCES multidisciplinary_meetings(meeting_id)
);

CREATE TABLE meetings (
 meeting_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
 team_id INT NOT NULL,
 meeting_date DATE NOT NULL,
 duration TIME NOT NULL,
 location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE consultations (
 consultation_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
 team_id INT NOT NULL,
 patient_id INT NOT NULL,
 consultation_date DATE NOT NULL,
 consultation_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Meetings (
	eam_id INT,
oom_id INT,
oom_capacity INT,
meeting_date DATE,
meeting_time TIME,
PRIMARY KEY (team_id, room_id),
FOREIGN KEY (team_id) REFERENCES TeleoncologyTeams(team_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Consultations (
	eam_id INT,
patient_id INT,
consultation_date DATE,
consultation_time TIME,
consultation_type VARCHAR(255),
PRIMARY KEY (team_id, patient_id),
FOREIGN KEY (team_id) REFERENCES TeleoncologyTeams(team_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Patients (
	eam_id INT,
patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
patient_name VARCHAR(255),
patient_age INT,
patient_diagnosis VARCHAR(255),
FOREIGN KEY (team_id) REFERENCES TeleoncologyTeams(team_id)
);

CREATE TABLE MedicalRecords (
	eam_id INT,
patient_id INT,
record_id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
record_date DATE,
record_details TEXT,
FOREIGN KEY (team_id, patient_id) REFERENCES Patients(team_id, patient_id)
);
